content.rendered:
Directed by Raja Menon.

Written by Sonu Sinha. Ritesh Shah. Suresh Nair. Raja Menon. Rahul Nangia. Ritesh Shah.

Cast Akshay Kumar(Ranjit Katyal). Nimrat Kaur(Amrita Katyal). Kumud Mishra(Sanjeev Kohli). Prakash Belawadi(George). Inaamulhaq(Major Khalaf Bin Zayd). Lena(George’s Wife (as Lena Kumar)). Nissar Khan(Ashok). Ninad Kamat(Kurien). Kaizaad Kotwal(Poonawalla). Feryna Wazheir(Tasneem). Ajay Kumar(Joseph). Purab Kohli(Ibrahim Durrani). Gunjan Malhotra(Meher Poonawala). Pooja Nair(Preethi). Taranjit Kaur(Nair’s Wife (as Taranjeet Kaur)). Ajay Arya(Nair). Avtar Gill(Amrit Pal). Pawan Chopra(Brij, Indian Ambassador). Arun Bali(Bauji). Surendra Pal(Minister, External Affairs (as Surinder Pal)). Adiba Hussain(Simran). Ritika Badiani(George’s Daughter). Tvisha Bhavin Chopra(Nair’s Child). Jiyaara Pitalia(Tasneem’s Baby). Masood Ahmed(Rao). Kamal Karamchandani(Businessman #3). Jashan Singh Kohli(George’s Daughter’s Boyfriend (as Jashan Singh)). Jennifer Mistry Bansiwal(Rita (as Jennifer Mistry)). Bachan Pachehra(Old Man (as Bacchan Pachera)). Harshad Kumar(Office Staff Member #1).

Language Hindi.

Producers Monisha Advani. Nikkhil Advani. Aruna Bhatia. Madhu Bhojwani. Hanif Chunawala. Shivaji Dasgupta. Hemraj Dogra. Karan Joshi. Ajay Kapoor. Akshay Kumar. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Vikram Malhotra. Suchit Mukherjee. Gaurav Nanda. Mini Purushot.

Production Emmay Entertainment. T-Series.
